content: TE DRS-Y Dust removal system Dust removal system for concrete drilling and chiseling with Hilti SDS Max (TE-Y) rotary hammers ### Categories: Home > Products > Dust and water management > Dust extraction attachments- - - ### FEATURES:Features Unique Hilti system for virtually dust-free drilling and chiseling with SDS Max rotary hammers Safer jobsites â€“ significantly reduce the amount of airborne dust Applications Virtually dustless drilling at depths of up to 300 mm with drill bits of 12-52 mm diameter and 520-570 mm in length Virtually dustless chiseling with chisels 240-500 mm in length Virtually dustless coring with Hilti percussion core bits 68-150 mm in diameter ### TECHNICAL DATA: Tool type: Rotary hammer SDS-Max Need vacuum cleaner: Yes Suitable for chiseling: Yes Technical Data | Tool type | Rotary hammer SDS-Max | Need vacuum cleaner | Yes ### ITEMS- 2055718 - Kit box TE DRS-Y - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x TE DRS-Y Dust removal system assy - 273322 - Extraction head - long TE-DRS-B - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x TE DRS-B Extraction head long - 273323 - Extraction head - short TE-DRS-B - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x TE DRS-B Extraction head short
